Reviews.Title: Great phone (even if default language is Japanese)
Reviews.Author: David A. Brask "Aaron252"
Reviews.Content: I've always preferred more slender phones and this HTC One Mini is perfect for me. The one I ordered appeared to be a Japanese model and required me figuring out the Japanese menus to switch to US English (but it was easy since my old HTC One menu was virtually the same).The phone is zippy quick. I wish Blinkfeed could be turned off, but I just used Apex Launcher to bury it altogether. I'm still learning how to customize everything but this is the best phone I've owned yet.FWIW, I am in the US (FL) and use T-Mobile service.
